snippet: The Martina Arroyo Foundation’s Prelude to Performance program, featuring young singers, staged Verdi’s “Falstaff” Friday evening at Hunter College’s Kaye Playhouse.
abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews Martina Arroyo Foundation production of Verdi opera Falstaff, featuring a group of aspiring young singers, staged at Hunter College's Kaye Playhouse.
lead_paragraph: The Martina Arroyo Foundation’s Prelude to Performance program, featuring young singers, staged Verdi’s “Falstaff” Friday evening at Hunter College’s Kaye Playhouse.

headline.seo: ‘Falstaff,’ Part of Prelude to Performance at Kaye Playhouse
headline.main: An Opera Reimagined and Infused With Youth
headline.print_headline: An Opera Reimagined And Infused With Youth
